1.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん。私のせいで ご迷惑を|おかけして ごめんなさい。:
<%sPC_NAME_1>. I'm sorry for the trouble|I've caused you... Up until now, I've lived|my life with my past hidden from me. But I|
|thought you would treat me the same even if|you knew about my past, and that's why I|decided to tell you. I'm really glad I met|
|you...

3.よう！ あらためて 礼を言わせてくれ。|ピンチを救ってくれたことも そうだけど|:
Hey! I just wanted to thank you again... I|mean, you saved my life, but when you told me|that you joined Fuki to help my brother, you|
|didn't give me a hard time about it. It made|me happy because it was really important to|me. That's right. Let's keep working hard for|
|Fuki!

5.<%sPC_NAME_1>ってさ ホント なんなの？|魔族だって知ったのに 助け:
What's with <%sPC_NAME_1>, really? He knows|I'm a demon, but he still wants to help me...|does he really care about me that much? I've|
|observed a lot of people in my time, but none|of them are as weird as you... I mean... It's|a good thing for me that you're still the|
|same.

6.いっぱい いっぱい ありがとう。||これからも ずっと いっしょ！|||だいすき: There's so much, so much... We'll always be|together! So...

7.迷惑をかけちまって 本当にすまねえ。|今 手紙を書くような 気分じゃないが|どう:
I'm so sorry for the trouble I've caused you.|I don't feel like writing a letter right now,|but I really want to tell you how I feel. I|
|don't know what's going to happen in the|future, but I know I can get through it with|you. Thank you so much for coming to the|
|terrace. <%sPC_NAME_1>.

10.<%sPC_NAME_1>。この前は ありがとうな。|俺が お前の恋人に なれる:
<%sPC_NAME_1>. Thank you for the other day.|It's like I'm still dreaming that I could be|your lover. We'll always be together. Thank|
|you... 。

12.ごきげんよう <%sPC_NAME_1>さん。|あなたが 真実の愛を知った記念に:
Good day to you. <%sPC_NAME_1>. I'd like to|give you a small gift to commemorate your|discovery of true love... For more|
|information, please come to the home|economics room on the third floor of the|first main building... Please feel free to|
|visit when you can... From Shugamell, the|deliverer of love.

15.あなたにかけた カモフラージュの|魔法のことで 伝え忘れたことがあるの。|申し訳:
There's something I forgot to tell you about|the camouflage spell I cast on you. I'm|sorry, but I'm afraid you'll have to ask Miss|
|Reveiva in the staff room for more|information. From Flasset, our admissions|officer.

18.面と向かって 言うのが|テレくさいから 手紙を書くよ。|僕が 過去の呪縛から 解:
I was too shy to say it face-to-face, so I|wrote you a letter. You've freed me from the|shackles of my past. Next time I'm back home,|
|I'll tell my mother I made a great friend...|Thank you so much for coming to this|school...

19.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>へ。あたしがフウキに|復:
<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>. Thank you for|giving me a chance to come back to Fuki... It|was you who gave me the courage to leave|
|Sinaitic at the last moment... I finally got|to tell my family that I was free. I hope|that one day I can help you...

20.<%sPC_NAME_1> 俺の告白を|受け入れてくれて 本当にありがとう。|勇:
<%sPC_NAME_1> Thank you so much for accepting|my confession... I'm glad I had the courage|to tell you how I feel... I'm the happiest|
|person in the world to be dating|<%sPC_NAME_1>... From now on, we'll make lots|of memories together...

22.<%sPC_NAME_1>に 出会うまでは|まさか ここまで夢中になれる人間が|:
Before I met <%sPC_NAME_1>, I never thought|there could be anyone in this world that I|could fall so madly in love with. As I|
|promised you last night, you'll be my|forever. I'll never let you go. I'll never|let you go...

23.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>と あたしは|今日から: <%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN> and I are lovers|from today! Heh.<heart>So, from now on, please call me "Crown",|okay? Let's be so close that everyone gets|jealous.<heart>

25.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん……私 幸せです。|私のことが好きだと 言ってくだ:
<%sPC_NAME_1>... I, Sachi... I was really,|really happy when you told me you liked me...|I'm a fool, but I'll do my best. I know I'm a|
|bit of a fool, but I'll do my best, so please|keep in touch with me for a long time to|come...

27.<%sPC_NAME_1>へ||おヨメさんするは もっとあと。|けど いっぱい: Dear <%sPC_NAME_1>, as a wife, you're not|really... But we're good friends...|<%sPC_NAME_1> I love you.<heart>
